DOC.brief_summary: This is a tissue, urine, and blood banking protocol for cutaneous t-cell lymphoma (CTCL), eczema, and atopic dermatitis patients for current and future research.
DOC.brief_title: Blood, Urine, and Tissue Collection for Cutaneous Lymphoma, Eczema, and Atopic Dermatitis Research
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to provide a central mechanism for monitoring access to peripheral blood, urine, and skin specimens obtained from CTCL, eczema, and atopic dermatitis patients to monitor: - immunologic assays/flow cytometry - tumor progression/regression - genomic studies - proteomic studies - others germane to the advancement of CTCL treatment
DOC.criteria: 18 or older able and willing to provide informed consent diagnosed with CTCL diagnosed with either atopic dermatitis or eczema Lack of CTCL, atopic dermatitis, or eczema diagnosis in medical record
